inclusion.criterion: Children with respiratory lower tract infection
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with past history of cardiac disease
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Patients with past history of renal disease.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: 79 yo F with multifactorial chronic hypoxemia and dyspnea thought due to diastolic CHF, pulmonary hypertension thought secondary to a chronic ASD and COPD on 5L home oxygen. Cardiology consult recommended a right heart cath for evaluation of response to sildenafil but the patient refused.
